benchmark_details.name: MIMIC-IV-Ext-PE (MIMIC-IV Extended Pulmonary Embolism)
benchmark_details.overview: This benchmark adds nearly 20,000 labeled CTPA radiology reports from the MIMIC-IV dataset, which can be utilized for better identification and research of pulmonary embolism (PE).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a publicly available dataset of labeled CTPA reports to improve PE detection and enhance research in the field of hemostasis and thrombosis.

data.annotation: Manually labeled by two physicians and verified using a transformer language model

methodology.calculation: Sensitivity calculated by the ratio of true positive cases to the total actual positives.
methodology.interpretation: Higher sensitivity indicates better performance in identifying true PE cases.
methodology.validation: The performance was validated against manual adjudication by physicians.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All data in MIMIC-IV has been de-identified.
